page.title: 13THE MARKET
page.content: The market is held on a Wednesday and is very popular.Sometimes,the stalls people need are not there but this is not so always.The most used stall is the sweets and cake stall.Some people think that it would better if it was held in the new Rainbow Supermarket carpark.There are about 26 stalls altogether.Most of the stall holders said that they chose this job because they wanted to be their own boss.The stallholders come from quite a few different places.For instance, the owner of the pet food stall comes only a quarter of a mile while the holder of the jacket and coat stall travels 20 miles.The market is used by a lot of local people because it offers an interesting range of goods at competitive prices.
